item.title: Whats Wrong with this code?
item.dc:creator: @killer_2008 killer_2008
item.description:
@killer_2008 wrote:

So i want the dfs effect to work on my server so this are my codes, when i add them it doesnt give me any errors but the kbd keeps hitting way to high on me even when i have the shield… i added it in the npchandler , does some one know what im doing wrong?

[code]if(plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerShield] == 1540 || plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerShield] == 2621 || plr.protMage) {
hitDiff = 3 + misc.random(7);
} else if(plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerShield] != 1540 && plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerShield] != 2621) {
hitDiff = 20 + misc.random(30);
}
} else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 50 && misc.random(3)==1){
if(plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerShield] == 1540 || plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerShield] == 2621 || plr.protMage) {
hitDiff = 3 + misc.random(7);
hitDiff = 20 + misc.random(30);
}

if(plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerShield] == 1540 || plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerShield] == 2621 || plr.protMage) {
hitDiff = 3 + misc.random(7);
} else if(plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerShield] != 1540 || plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerShield] != 2621) {
hitDiff = 20 + misc.random(30);
}[/code]

Read full topic
